text: The 2009 season was the fourth for the Lotto-Belisol Ladiesteam cycling team. ==Roster== *Lizzie Armitstead *Evelyn Arys *Sofie De Vuyst *Catherine Delfosse *Elise Depoorter *Rochelle Gilmore *Vera Koedooder *Lien Lanssens *Emma Mac Kie *Kim Schoonbaert *Emma Silversides *Linn Torp *Annelies van Doorslaer *Grace Verbeke == Season victories == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Single day and stage races 2009 |- ! Date !! Nation !!Race !! Cat. !! Winner |- | || British National Track Championships - Points race || 20px || Lizzie Armitstead |- | || British National Track Championships - Scratch || 20px || Lizzie Armitstead |- | || Norwegian National Road Race Championships || 20px || Linn Torp |} ==Other achievements== ===Dutch national record, team pursuit=== Vera Koedooder, as part of the national team, broke together with Ellen van Dijk and Amy Pieters the Dutch team pursuit record three times in 2009 {| class="wikitable" |- ! | - |- |24 September |UCI Road World Championships – Women's road race | | 9th |} ==UCI World Ranking== The team finished 4th in the UCI ranking for teams. {| class="wikitable alternance" style="text-align:left;" |+ Individual UCI World Ranking ! scope="col" style="background-color:#CCCCCC; width:50px;" | Rank ! scope="col" style="background-color:#CCCCCC; width:200px;" | Rider ! scope="col" style="background-color:#CCCCCC; width:50px;" | Points |- |8|| Rochelle Gilmore ||485 |- |13|| Grace Verbeke ||386 |- |58|| Elizabeth Armitstead ||90 |- |125|| Vera Koedooder ||29 |- |214|| Linn Torp ||10 |- |272|| Catherine Delfosse ||7 |- |372|| Emma Silversides ||2 |} ==References== Category:2009 UCI Women's Teams seasons UCI Category:Lotto–Soudal Ladies
